LeBron James 2011-12 statistics are 27.1 PPG, 7.90 RPG, 6.2 APG, and +29.85 EFF.
LeBron James won the Maurice Podoloff Trophy as the 2011-12 Kia NBA Most Valuable Player Award.
LeBron James has 3 MVP awards in the last 4 years.
LeBron James fouled out of Game 4 for the first time in a playoff game, and the first time he has fouled out of any game since defecting from Cleveland to Miami in the summer of 2010.
LeBron James was the 3rd highest-paid athlete with $53 million from May 2011 to May 2012.
